name: New York City - Upper West Side Apt
space: Murphy bed, optional second bedroom available. Wifi available, Hulu, Netflix, TV Eat-in kitchen. Bathroom with great shower/bath.  Washer/dryer in basement.
description: Murphy bed, optional second bedroom available. Wifi available, Hulu, Netflix, TV Eat-in kitchen. Bathroom with great shower/bath.  Washer/dryer in basement. New York City! Great neighborhood - many terrific restaurants, bakeries, bagelries. Within easy walking distance are restaurants with the cuisines from India, Thailand, Japan, China, Mexico, South America and Europe.  As well as the many small independent stores that line Broadway, there chain stores such as Urban Outfitters (clothing), Whole Foods (groceries), Sephora (cosmetics), Michaels (crafts), and Modell's (sporting goods). Equidistant to Central Park and Riverside Park which have walking/running/biking trails as well as tennis and racquet ball courts. 10-15 blocks from Columbia University between Broadway and Amsterdam. The International Hostel across the street is an airport shuttle bus and double-decker tour bus stop.  The Hostel also has services available to the neighborhood such as lectures, brochures, etc. Convenientl
neighborhood_overview: Great neighborhood - many terrific restaurants, bakeries, bagelries. Within easy walking distance are restaurants with the cuisines from India, Thailand, Japan, China, Mexico, South America and Europe.  As well as the many small independent stores that line Broadway, there chain stores such as Urban Outfitters (clothing), Whole Foods (groceries), Sephora (cosmetics), Michaels (crafts), and Modell's (sporting goods). Equidistant to Central Park and Riverside Park which have walking/running/biking trails as well as tennis and racquet ball courts. 10-15 blocks from Columbia University between Broadway and Amsterdam. The International Hostel across the street is an airport shuttle bus and double-decker tour bus stop.  The Hostel also has services available to the neighborhood such as lectures, brochures, etc.
notes: My cat, Samantha, are in and out during the summer.  The apt is layed out in such a  way that each bedroom is very private.
transit: Conveniently located near 1, 2, 3, B & C subway lines. Also buses on Columbus Avenue (downtown), Amsterdam Avenue (uptown), and Broadway (uptown/downtown). Also near origination/termination of M60 bus which goes to/from LaGuardia Airport.
house_rules: No smoking is permitted in the apartment. All towels that are used should be placed in the bath tub upon departure. I have a cat, Samantha, who can stay or go, whichever is preferred.   Please text me upon departure.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: By now I have lived longer in the city than the country however I feel equally at home in each. I like to keep one foot in each and help others to do the same!

reviews.comments: i had a really pleasant stay at greta's place. the location is super convenient -- and the area is fun, with lots of hidden gems. the apartment was comfortable and charming. greta was accommodating and hospitable and left some great cupcakes in the fridge. i give this place a strong endorsement.

Greta has been a great host, and her apartment a great place to stay. Perfectly located for our adventures around NYC, it is a place full of character and, as I see it, a very authentic NY Apartment that makes you feel at home imediately. Great neighbourhood, great infrastructure around the apartment block. Very good for a perfect stay.

Greta was wonderful. We arrived late at night and she made sure we were able to get in. We also had to transfer to a hotel for work, and she allowed us to keep our belongings there until 3 so we wouldn't be carting our luggage until we needed to. The apartment was clean and large and in a wonderful neighborhood. She had lists and menus of places to eat. I couldn't have been happier with our arrangement. Thanks Greta!

Greta's place is very well located, so close to the MTA 1 line, which takes you up and down Manhattan, which was perfect for me.  It was an easy 3 minute walk and be on your way to anywhere in NY. 
The shower is something else, the best water pressure I have experienced in a long time.
I thought the decor was cool and eclectic, Greta must have an artistic streak. The Murphy bed was comfortable, and the AC unit (not pictured) kept it nice and cool.  
Although I didn't meet her, she arranged for a neighbor to meet me and show me in. He was cool and so were any other neighbors that I met. 
She also left a list of suggestions where to shop and eat, along with menus which was helpful when I needed a late night meal. 
Highly recommended.
I had a wonderful stay at Greta's NYC apartment. The apartment was clean and comfortable. She was a wonderful and informative host. I felt very welcomed in her home.

Hi Greta,
you have a wonderful place. We had a great time an felt really comfortable - little bit like beeing home in NY :)
Everything worked out pretty good, also the connection to La Guardia Airport was perfect.

Thanks again :)

Greta was very welcoming and helpful. Prompt email communication.

A great stay for those in town to see Broadway shows, shopping or sight seeing the West Side. A few minutes walking and I was in Central Park.

A definite recommendation.

Greta was flexible about our sign-in time, helpful as we arrived, and kind to return to us a bag that we left in her apartment.  The apartment is wonderfully located for transportation and things to do.  It is compact and comfy, full of interesting books and prints.  The bed is quite firm.

We spent three nights in Greta’s apartment. Her kitchen is fully-equipped and the sleeping arrangements are extremely comfortable. Greta is a very accommodating host and easy to communicate with. She was very gracious about our later-than-expected arrival and allowed us to stay in her apartment on our departure day until we left for an early evening flight. Her apartment is very well-located, with food markets, drug stores, restaurants and coffee shops within a block of her building. The building is ½ block from the #1 subway line, enabling easy access to all parts of Manhattan.

We enjoyed our stay in Greta's apartment very much. The location is perfect, near Central Park, Broadway and everything, and the apartment is extremely cosy. Greta was very welcoming and helpful. We had a great time and felt really comfortable. Thanks :-)

Our stay are Greta's was wonderful- she was so accomodating and welcoming.  Her apartment is lovely and such a great place to unwind from the hurried family weekend weekend we had.  Greta even accomodated the joining of my niece and nephew for one of the two nights with no problem.. Thank you so much, Greta, for your hospitality!

Greta was a gracious and accommodating host, even coming over during our stay to reset the wifi connections.  The location of the apartment is ideal, basically half a short block to the subway.  Her list of neighborhood restaurants was very helpful and we sampled as many as we were able to. She has everything organized well.
Greta's apartment was comfortable and clean and the neighborhood was easily accessible to museums and other locations. A bit noisy at night.

Greta was extremely helpful throughout this process!  Communication was maintained throughout the process and throughout our stay.  She was able to answer any questions we had and even gave suggestions for us.  Her instructions were awesome and the information left at her apartment were great!  There was even a binder with additional information like places to eat and places to go.  She even took the time to make sure we knew how to use the radiator!  Being from Hawaii, we had no knowledge about radiators and how to use them - we really appreciated her thoughtfulness!

Greta's apartment was homey, clean and just the right size for two (probably even three) people. Greta was extremely helpful in getting us settled and providing information about the neighborhood....etc. Murphy bed was very firm but comfortable. Great water pressure in shower. Apt is close to everything and  the neighborhood has so much to offer. I would definitely recommend Greta's place.

The apartment is very homey - it felt like I was staying in a friend's apartment. The bed is surprisingly comfy and firm (I have never slept in a Murphy bed before) and the shower had plenty of hot water and great pressure. Greta was very communicative and friendly, and was also incredibly accommodating when I had something come up unexpectedly and needed to stay a couple hours longer than I anticipated. Overall all it was a very cozy stay in a great location!

The location of this appartment was ideal! Just minutes away the subway and walking distance from Central Park, Riverside Park, and many good restaurants on Broadway. A quaint appartment, with a lot of cachet. I recommend it!!

What a delightful apartment!  I plan to stay here next time I bring family to New York. I would describe the apartment as a very warm, personal, comfortable and homey place to stay. It’s a corner apartment with good light, lots of books and  very good energy. Plus, the beds are quite comfortable. My daughter exclaimed “Hey Dad, come lie down in this one. You’ll never want to get up!”

The neighborhood was incredibly well located and enjoyable. The train stops  a half block away, and there are numerous excellent restaurants and conveniences close by. Greta, the host, provides a first-rate list of recommendations.

Greta was a personable, helpful and extremely welcoming host. She was very quick to respond to my online inquiries and, once we arrived, to any further requests for advice.

Greta was a lovely host! She was communicative, helpful and flexible during the booking process and very responsive and friendly when we were at her place in NYC. The house is charming and comfortable, and very conveniently located right by the 1 train. We were two of us and only used one room, but the house can fit another person or two. 
For anyone visiting NYC and looking to be in the city but not in the midst of the city noise, this is a great place to stay! You can be downtown in 20 minutes.

I stayed at Greta's place for 3 days! It was a really pleasant stay! The bed was really comfortable. The place was clean and cozy. A minute from the subway station! I didnt meet Greta in person, but we were communicating all the time and she was really helpful and kind with everything I needed! I would love to stay again the next time! :) i surely recommend it!

Staying at Greta's apartment was delightful!  It's a wonderful, quirky New York apartment -- very compact, but also very comfy and accurately portrayed in the pictures.  The Murphy (fold-down) bed has a very thick memory foam mattress that is extremely comfortable.  Samantha (the cat) was a sweet little presence, but she kept mostly to herself so we barely saw her.  The location is great, less than a block to the 1 line, and there are several nice restaurants in the neighborhood.  Finally, Greta herself was a perfect host:  kind but not intrusive, thoughtful in her preparations for guests, and available should any problems arise (though none did).  A great airbnb experience!

Greta was a great host.  She met us late on Friday and explained everything about the apartment which we found very comfortable and fun.  I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone.  It is not luxurious but well-equipped and I loved the location, near Central Park and easy walk to museums.

Apt is beautifully as advertised, a comfortable place and beds, kitchen and bath. Arrival and departure were really well coordinated by host, the lovely Greta. Location is fabulously convenient on upper West side by subway, Amsterdam and Broadway restaurants, bars and history. We'd stay here again.

Greta was a lovely host, making sure we settled in well and could contact her easily if there were any problems. 
The apartment is cosy with very comfortable beds and a well equipped kitchen in case you need a place to cook. It is also a nice neighborhood, with a lot of great places to eat nearby and it is a minute away from a subway station, so you are well connected to the rest of the city. We had a great time!

My daughter and I stayed the weekend at Gretas place.  Greta was herself away for the weekend but everything was in great shape for us to stay and Greta was very available by phone for any questions.  Everything was very tidy and clean..comfy beds and good shower.  It was like home.  The location in the city is perfect..close to the park and subway.  I highly recommend Gretas home for aNew York stay!

Greta is an amazing host and her apartment was super convenient for my stay in Manhattan. Here are my reasons:
First - she as a person made me feel super welcome. I requested her a really early check in and she agreed (which was helpful because I took a red eye from Seattle). She also allowed me to keep my bags after my check out time so I could pick it up before my flight.
Second - her apartment location is SUPER convenient. Right next to the #1 and pretty close to B and C lines. NYC is all about location is this fits perfectly.
Third - her apartment gives the feel of a typical NYC apartment. It is tiny but has everything you need. Two beds, a great shower, clean towels, and a kitchen (which I didn't use). Safe building with elevator. 

I would totally stay here again.

Greta was a fantastic host, we had a problem with a lost luggage at JFK and she helped us to coordinate the delivery. We also arrived later than scheduled in Manhattan, Greta was waiting for us, she welcomed us very friendly. The apartment is very nice and bright, the bed is very comfortable. Nice building with elevator, perfect location, between Riverside Park and Central Park, a block from the subway, lot of nice restaurants all around, we had a fantastic stay! Greta est une hôte fantastique, nous avons eu un problème de baggage à JFK et Greta nous a aidé à coordonner la livraison. Nous sommes arrivés plus tard que prévu et Greta nous a accueilli très chaleureseument. L'appartement est parfaitement situé, a un block du métro et entre Cantral Park et Riverside Park, il y a un ascenceur. Nombreux restaurants tout autour! Parfait nous recommandons vivement.
We had a great stay with Greta.  She was a good communicator, flexible, and her apartment is a good value for the neighborhood.  We will definitely think about staying with her again.

My stay at Greta's place was perfect! The space is exactly as described, and was very clean and welcoming. Greta was very responsive to me, and even helped me figure out how to pick up the keys with my late arrival. Thank you!

Greta was an excellent hostess and was very accommodating. She took care of the little things that made a difference such as providing an extra set of keys and having the air conditioning on prior to my arrival. The apartment was clean and very comfortable. It instantly felt like "home". The location of the apartment was great! There are multiple grocery stores, restaurants, bars, etc. within a very short walking distance. The subway stop was very conveniently located as was Central Park and Riverside Park, which are both beautiful places for an afternoon walk. I would and have recommended this listing to friends that are traveling to the city and I would stay there again without hesitation.

Greta is an excellent Airbnb host! She is warm, accommodating and very well organized. Her apt is located close to all amenities, Central and Riverside Parks, and bus/subway stops. The apt is clean, more spacious than expected, well stocked with anything you could possibly need, and has very comfortable beds and a first rate shower. I was travelling with my soon-to-be 17 year old daughter so she was thrilled to have her own bedroom! This is not fancy accommodation but warm and homey and probably a good representation of how an average New Yorker lives, although I suspect not many are as organized as Greta. Much recommended!

I have used airbnb in NYC several times, and this, by far, was my best experience.  The location is on a quiet street and on the same block as a major subway line.  You can't get any better than that.  The apartment has all the conveniences of a home - everything you'd need in a kitchen, extremely comfortable mattress, cable TV, air conditioning, wifi, great water pressure.  

Greata goes way out of her way to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.  Her recommendations are outstanding and the check-in and check-out were  extremely easy.  This is a five star host and you won't go wrong with this choice for a stay in NYC.

This is my second time staying at Greta's apartment. The best place to stay in NYC by far. There is a subway on the same street as the apartment, a two minute walk away (the 1 line) and multiple places to eat close by. There is also a CVS , Walgreens, grocery and liquor store within walking distance as well. The apartment is very clean and the bed is very comfortable. Checking in and out as easy as Greta is very flexible. The apartment is very spacious with a nice kitchen and lots of room in the fridge. I hope to continue to stay here every time I visit New York!

Greta place is amazing and blissful. She was understand to our delayed scheduled. Her place is home away from home. Her details description gave us point of interest to visit. If I was to go to NYC again I would check Greta place available first.

We had a wonderful experience staying at Greta's flat. She is an amazing host: disposable, kind and always ready to answer back to our necessities, including late check-in and check-out. The flat itself is a true newyorker's one, warm, stylish and excellentlty connected with the subway. We strongly suggest it for everyone!

Greta was very welcoming and flexible.  My friend and I slept well in comfortable beds under soft cotton sheets in this lovely quiet flat on the upper west side.  We walked to the Museum of Natural History and hopped on the subway (less than one block away!) to go downtown.  Greta's place offered a sweet artful respite from the rush of the city.

Greta was as amazing as her beautiful home!  The check in and check out process was easy.  Greta's communication was super convenient as she used text messaging and email to keep in constant communication.  Her apartment is beautifully decorated, extremely comfortable, and very welcoming.   The neighborhood is safe with stores and restaurants within a short walking distance.  I highly recommend Greta's apartment for renting.  You won't be disappointed.

What can we say? Greta is a delight and her place is perfect. The beds are comfortable, the kitchen is an eat-in and the bathroom is classic New York. The building is almost 150 years old and holds up. The location is perfect, a block to the 1 train and four blocks from the bus to LA Guardia. Everything was perfect and we already miss Samantha. Thank you Greta and we hope to be able to stay there in the future.
Easy to make arrangements, was readily available for questions, and flexible about arriving and departing. Highly recommend this Upper West Side accommodation.

Greta and I communicated regularly before my trip,she was prompt and helpful. She met me at the apartment and was very welcoming,filled me in on all I needed to know. The apartment is so lovely and convenient and cosy and beautiful! Great area. I'd love to come back.

Greta went out of her way to assist us with difficult flight times and luggage which really made things easier for us. The area was good and as everyone notes, great for the subway, which works far better than the tourist buses which barely move at times with traffic. Lots of eateries etc handy.

Throughout, all Greta's communications were prompt, friendly and helpful.  We felt very prepared and welcome in her apartment, which is charming, comfortable and well located - a real 'home-from-home' to return to after a hot day's sight-seeing.  It was fun to have a brief swap over with the previous visitors (agreed previously by email with Greta).   Many thanks for a great stay.
This was a unique apartment in an excellent location. Great for anyone having business at Columbia University. Close to restaurants, transportation. Highly recommend.

Greta is a wonderful Host. Very honest, helpful. Great to work with. The neighborhood was awesome, close to subway, parks. Fabulous bagel store. The house is cute, quaint. Your really get the feel of what it's like to live there. I recommend this place. My daughter and I had a great time.

short version: if available, take it! more details: Greta is a great host. very helpful and pragmatic about arrival and departure to accommodate travellers plans as best as possible. the apartment is very cosy and you feel like visiting a good friend or relative big apple. location between 2 subway lines and a 10min walk from central park is just great. a whole foods and other shops are on the way to get all necesseties. building is well maintained and clean like the whole neighborhood. surprisingly quite for the central location. we habe been there in july and were able to manage the heat well by the window aircons to have a good night sleep. Greta always replied immediately in the outmost helpful way during preparation and stay. thank you Greta! we will hopefully be back soon :)
Greta went through a lot of trouble to accommodate our flight times and make our arrival and departure as convenient as possible. Much appreciated!
Nous avons apprécié la flexibilité de Greta pour répondre à nos questions et la localisation de l appartement très proche du métro.

Our second stay at Greta's on the last leg of our holiday, the city was oh so hot and humid but fortunately her air conditioning was equal to the task. The subway entrance close to the apartment was manned and easy to buy and top up your pass, it is the only way to travel around the city. On leaving for the airport, after both our stays we had only to wait a minute on the corner with our luggage to get a taxi to the airport. Once again Greta allowed us to arrive and leave at times that suited us with our luggage which didn't leave us stranded for hours with difficult flight times from Australia which was a great relief, thanks so much Greta!

We had a wonderful stay in NYC. Greta was a wonderful host, excellent communication, very helpful and accommodating. The location was perfect for us near restaurants and Columbia. We would love to stay there again. Thank You Greta!
The apartment is in a nice neighbor. The Italian restaurant next store was good. Communication with Greta was exceptional. We would definitely stay here again.

This was my second stay at Greta's place, and it was absolutely wonderful.  The apartment is clean, comfortable, and very well organized.  I especially love the decor and comfortable bedding. The neighborhood is safe and very convenient with easy access to bus lines and rail.  There is also a wide variety of restaurants within walking distance.  Greta is a very attentive and responsive hostess.  You will not be disappointed with her or her wonderful home.  I highly recommend!

We had a great stay in New York City. Greta's apartment was perfect, great location just three blocks from Central Park and 1 block from major subway lines. The apartment was spacious, clean, quiet and welcoming. Thank you for making our new York experience even better. I greatly recommend Greta's place. She even let us stay until 2pm the day of departure. Thank you
Jean

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in New York. Greta's place was a home away from home. The location was ideal with subway station, shops and restaurants just a few minutes  walk, even an Italian restaurant next door.  Central Park only 2 blocks away. Greta is very obliging and helpful especially her flexibility with our late flights.  If we ever make it back to New York would definitely love to stay at Greta's again.
Great location close to subway & everything you would possibly need! Greta was very accommodating & if we stay in NYC again we will definitely be looking into booking her place first ;)
Great place for families! Nice location (we even found on-street parking easily), and great neighborhood for restaurants.
Fantastic location and value. Host is very accommodating and responsive.

Greta is an amazing host with a very cute apartment. She was very responsive to our questions and provided us with a lot of information about the area. The location was amazing, so close the the 1 and Starbucks, DD and grocery stores. Would 100% stay here again if I returned to New York.

Greta's place is comfortable and homey.  Each of the three bedrooms has a door, which is a real treat in a big city! A true New York apartment experience!  Birds singing in the trees outside, comfy beds, loads of restaurants and grocery nearby. Lovely easy walks to Central Park, Riverside Park. Subway stop right on the corner. We took Lyft around due to my mom's use of a wheelchair in the streets. Drivers made good time to and from lower Manhattan via larger roads. Elevator made it easy to get to and from the 4th floor apartment, and being on the 4th floor removed us from the street a bit.
Overall a very nice apartment in a nice location. Plenty of restaurants in the area. Greta was a friendly and forthcoming host
Great host, great Appartement, great location. Again any time.

The place was so conveniently located at a mere 1-2 minutes walk from the subway. It was very cozy, everything was neat and tidy and really made us feel like we were home. Greta went the extra mile to help us with the check-in, and was super fast and responsive and made sure we didn't lack anything! My go-to airbnb place of choice for the next time we'll be in town.

Greta's place was perfect. We were in a three-week program at Columbia and walked into class each day. The place was spacious and quiet. Air conditioning was perfect in the hot New York summer! Would 100% stay again.

Lovely and homely apartment right in the heart of uptown Manhattan. Has a subway station on the same block, surrounded by great eats and just a couple of streets away from Central Park. Totally would come back when we visit New York again.

Greta's apartment is perfect for a couple who want to stay away from the noisy downtown area. The neighbourhood is peaceful, but has some good taverns and restaurants as well. Greta could not be any more helpful, going way beyond to get an item we left at the apartment to us. We cannot recommend Greta,s  highly enough.
It was lovely to have Greta to greet us. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in New York and in her apartment.

Gretas Appartement ist wirklich schön und gemütlich. Wir waren super zufrieden! Die Lage ist perfekt um zügig in Richtung Downtown oder in den Central Park zu gelangen. Falls man mit dem Auto anreist ist das Parken auf der Straße kostenlos. Auch Check-In und Kommunikation liefen völlig reibungslos. Sehr zu empfehlen!

This was our 2nd stay at Greta's place and we loved it just as much as the first time we stayed. Again, great location (1 min walk from the subway), and we even managed to find free parking around! The place is really cozy and it's starting to feel like our 2nd home in NYC. Good shower, kitchen, separate bedrooms and a nice neighborhood close to central park. What more can you need? Highly recommended!

We had a really great time at Greta’s apartment! First of all she was very nice with us since the beggining, helping with all our doubts. The apartment is near of Central Park and a lot of stores and restaurants. It’s a calm local neighborhood, to live your days in the city like a real new yorker :) . The place was very clean, the shower was good and beds was confortable. The heater sistem worked very well and kept us warm always - it was very important, because the temperatures was very low during our stay there. We definetelly recomend this place to stay!

Loved the stay here. Greta is a wonderful host. The room is spacious and you have everything you need. The neighborhood is beautiful, lots of restaurants nearby, and the red train is literally next to the apartment. 
Definitely recommended.

greta was a super host! the house really nice and well kept. the bed is very comfortable and equipped with everything. the neighborhood is very safe and close to all amenities: the metro, supermarkets, main attractions, restaurants. Greta made sure that my stay was unforgettable, always present but never intrusive and respectful of privacy. it has always been helpful for every kind of need. thanks to greta for making my stay beautiful. surely if i go back to new york i will definitely come back here.

name: Copacabana Apartment Posto 6
summary: The Apartment has a living room, toilet, bedroom (suite) and American kitchen. Well located, on the Copacabana beach block a 05 Min. walk from Ipanema beach (Arpoador). Internet wifi, cable tv, air conditioning in the bedroom, ceiling fans in the bedroom and living room, kitchen with microwave, cooker, Blender, dishes, cutlery and service area with fridge, washing machine, clothesline for drying clothes and closet with several utensils for use.  The property boasts 45 m2.
space: The apartment has a living room, wash room, suite and an American kitchen. The bedroom has a double bed and there's a bunk bed in the living room. It is very well located, in the Copacabana beach block and just a few blocks from Arpoador and Ipanema. You can walk to any of those beaches. It has internet wifi, tv, air conditioning in the bedroom, ceiling fans in the living room and the bedroom and an equipped kitchen with cooker, fridge, washing machine, microwave and utensils. Ease of public transportation, banks, markets and restaurants.

neighborhood_overview: Copacabana in the South zone is the district that offers the greatest number of options for tourists, transport, restaurants, banks, pharmacies and commerce in general are in abundance in all the blocks of the neighborhood.
transit: On the street there is plenty of transport and the subway station is nearby (06 blocks). To get to the Christ the Redeemer Statue there are the options of Metro, bus (at the door) or taxi and the Sugar Loaf (pão de açúcar), bus (at the door), cab, all very close.

house_rules: Entreguem o imóvel conforme receberam e respeitem as regras do condomínio para não serem incomodados.  Não danificar os utensílios e tudo que se refere as boas condições referentes ao mesmo . Não fazer barulho após às 22:00  até às 8:00. Usar entrada de serviço se estiver molhado voltando da praia.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Professora de Educação Física formada pela universidade Gama Filho.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Bom, foi uma experiencia incrível com a Ana e seu apartamento. Primeiramente ressalto a grande hospitalidade e prestatividade da anfitriã, na residência não tinha ferro de passar roupa solicitei e a mesma imediatamente comprou, deixou uns brindes na geladeira como água e cerveja, excelente tratamento.
Sobre o apartamento, muito bem localizado e bem arrumado, camas bem confortáveis e tudo funcionando corretamente.
Obrigado Ana, espero poder me hospedar em breve no seu ap.

abraços

Perfect location for Rio,very secure & very close to Copacabana and Ipanema beaches, the apartment is clean and very comfortable, all the equipment are included.
The host Ana its so nice, it was always available for us to help us for anything in the city, I would definitely recommend her place and i will stay there again if I have the chance !

I had an amazing time at Valeria's flat. 
The flat is great!!! Very very clean.
The location is perfect!
And on top of everything Valeria and her husband are fantastic host.
I highly recommend it.

Ana y José hicieron que nos sintiéramos en casa desde el primer momento (nos recibieron con cervecitas fresquitas), siempre pendientes de lo que podíamos necesitar y muy predispuestos para dar consejos y ayuda. Muy preocupados por que el apartamento estuviera en perfectas condiciones.
El Departamento es excelente, muy bien ubicado, ya que abajo hay un supermercado y en frente un Bradesco. Además muy completo, No nos faltó nada.
Si volvemos a Río seguro pararemos nuevamente con Ana y José.

Local muito agradavel proximo do Mercado Zona Sul - padaria e comercio. Localizado a 1 quadra da praia. Ambiente agradavel host bem prestativa e muito educada. Recomendo a todos que queiram conhecer melhor o Rio!
Excelente anfitrion siempre estuvo pendiente de lo que necesitabamos. El departamento es muy comodo limpio, y muy bien ubicado.

todo fue como estaba en la descripcion, inclusive tanto en toallas como ropa de cama habia de mas para cambiar, muy satisfecho por todo, ubicasion, internet, tv, comodidades y la atencion de ana, que estuvo siempre dispuesta a atendernos, inclusive dejando un celular para urgencias, colmo nuestras espectatibas

The location is perfect, ideal and safe walking distance to Ipanema and Copacabana, including Arpoador just 800 metres away; cheap for Uber to nearby attractions too. I even walked to Leblon from there in under 40 minutes. 

The hosts met me up front and helped me with my luggage. They don't speak English, but are very charming and helpful, so we communicated via (Hidden by Airbnb) Translate, using (Hidden by Airbnb) .

The building is slightly older. One day there was no water in the building due to maintenance. The hosts warned me about this, there was nothing they could do and I was prepared. Only issue is that after the water came back, because of the older pipes, it was brown for a little while, just have to let the taps run for several minutes. 

The bed isn't the most comfortable for an extended stay (I was there for eight nights), but for short durations it's fine. 

There is a washing machine in the apartment, it works great, I dried my clothes by hanging them on chairs, hooks, etc. 

The WiFi is strong and reliable. 

There is a grocery store and a couple of reasonably priced restaurants on the block, as well as two different banks. Excellent for visitors. A drug store is also available on the next block at the corner. 

Overall the inconveniences were small and the positives of this location was great.

Ana and Jose were wonderful hosts.  They were there when we arrived and showed us everything.  They provided a cell phone for us to use to be in contact with them and were very patient with our lack of technological experience. They were always helpful and accommodating. The apt. was very comfortable and convenient.  I highly recommend this place.  Ana speaks Portuguese and understands Spanish.  If you speak English, she has friends who can help with the translation.
A localização e excelente com tudo pertinho. Um supermercado ao lado assim como uma padaria e uma lanchonete.  Tinham muito bons restaurantes nas redondezas, inclusive um 24 horas.

A anfitriã Ana Valéria é ótima, simpática, super atenciosa, sempre pronta a ajudar. O ap e os utensílios da casa são super limpos, o banho é ótimo e a cama super confortável. A localização é perfeita. Pretendo voltar!

Ana Valéria e seu esposo foram extremamente atenciosos e prestativos. Nos receberam extremamente bem. Nos sentimos em casa. O imóvel é realmente o que aparece nas fotos. Muito bem localizado, limpo e funcional. Excelente.

Ana is an amazing host, she was very accommodating with check-in time and was very easily reached with any problems, even though none transpired. The apartment is about 1.5 blocks away from the beach with banks, restaurants, and a super market within a 10 minute walk. Would highly recommend staying with Ana to anybody wanting to see Rio.

Muito boa estadia. A Valéria foi ótima. Super atenciosa e prestativa. Localização é ótima. Acesso fácil às praia de copa e Ipanema. Muitos restaurantes, mercado....
Local limpo. Eu recomendo.

El departamento es genial, aireado, luminoso y muy bien equipado (aunque necesitarìa una mesa) La zona de Copacabana que habìamos elegido, muy conectado con Ipanema, y a pocas cuadras del metro (Gdor. Osorio) 
Anfitriones atentos y dispuestos. Nos encantò !!
A anfitriã e seu marido são muito simpáticos , apartamento ideal para um casal , localização fantástica , gostei muito .

Este departamento está a una cuadra de la playa, muy bien ubicado, en plena zona comercial y turística de Copacabana.  Al lado de la puerta de entrada había un supermercado con buenos precios y hay muchas tiendas de diferentes tipos alrededor.
El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos, muy acogedor y para nada caluroso. Hay un ventilador de techo en el living para la cama que está allí y un ventilador y aire acondicionado para la cama de dos plazas en la habitación. El departamento estaba muy limpio apenas llegamos, con todo en su lugar. Teníamos todo a nuestra disposición, todo bien ordenado.
Valeria nos recibió en la entrada y nos entregó las llaves en mano, nos explicó todo paso a paso del departamento. Su llavero tenía una tarjeta de descuento para el supermercado, ella nos lo prestó y nos sirvió mucho para hacer las compras. Valeria fue de gran ayuda en todo momento. Previo a llegar se contactó conmigo, también durante la estadía por si necesitábamos algo y previo a nuestra partida. Cuando la contactábamos, teníamos respuesta rápida. Eso nos hizo sentir muy cómodos y nos ayudó.
Tanto el departamento como la anfitriona hicieron que tuvieramos una gran estadía en Copacabana.

Ana Valéria é uma hospedeira muito legal! O apartamento dela é ótimo com todas as coisas do que você precisa. Super confortável e super bem localizado com um mercado ao lado.
Não tem como reclamar, tudo é perfeito!!!
Era como estaba en el anuncio de airbnb
Excelente estadía en el departamento de valeria. La ubicación es inmejorable y es muy cómodo. Ella y su esposo muy atentos y dispuestos a ayudar en todo momento. Sin duda lo recomiendo

Muito bom o apartamento! Recomendo e pretendo (Website hidden by Airbnb) acho que seria interessante ter no apto uma cadeira de praia e guarda-sol, quem fica por muitos dias hospedado acaba gastando muito com aluguel na praia.Bem localizado, limpo e apto bem dividido.Valeria foi super atenciosa e receptiva, sempre tentando ajudar no que fosse possível.

Fue realmente un placer alojarnos en el departamento de Copacabana. Perfectamente ubicado, todo funciona impecable, abajo hay un supermercado completo, restaurantes y las playas bien próximas. Y Ana Valeria, la anfitriona, un encanto, siempre conectada para saber sobre nuestras necesidades. Fue un viaje espectacular. EStamos muy agradecidos. Vamos a volver.
Hermoso depto. Cerca de la playa de ipanema . Ana Valeria se preocupo para que nuestra estadia sea buena.Excelente ubicacion, comodo y limpio
Todo perfecto. El departamento es muy lindo, completo, limpio y todo funciona perfectamente. Tanto Ana Valeria como José siempre atentos y en comunicación. Super recomendable!

Excelente ubicación y departamento muy hermoso. Valeria fue muy amable y comunicativa. Estuvo en cada detalle y ademas nos facilitó un lugar para poder dejar nuestras valijas luego del check out, ya que viajábamos tarde. Muy recomendable! Seguramente volveremos pronto.

Um bom apartamento, pertinho da pedra do Arpoardor e a 1 quadra da praia de Copacabana. Ônibus fácil para todo o canto, supermercado embaixo do prédio. Apartamento exatamente igual ao descrito no anúncio.
Apartamento bem equipado, localização excelente (tem tudo perto) e anfitriã muito disponível para as informações necessárias. Recomendo demais!

Super appartement, idéalement situé à deux pas de Copacabana, 10 minutes d'Ipanéma et du métro. L'appartement est fonctionnel, propre, agréable, sécurisé. En bas de l'immeuble, il y a un petit centre commercial bien pratique et une délicieuse boulangerie. Nous sommes restés 15 jours et avons énormément visité. Les plages à proximité sont vivantes. Enfin, merci à Anna Valéria pour nos échanges et ses attentions. Son ami Fernando nous a fait le transfert de l'appartement à l'aéroport. Il est adorable. Beaucoup de choses à découvrir à Rio. Nous avons fait un très beau voyage.
Super Recomendo! O apto é impecável, funcional, aconchegante e o melhor numa localização privilegiada! Sem contar o atendimento PRIME da Ana Valéria! Excelente!

Ana, fue un maravilloso viaje, sin la comodidad y buena ubicación del departamento no hubiese sido igual.  
Muito obrigado!

If you want something close to the beach and to live like a carioca this is the spot. Close to metro, ipanema, copa, supermarket, paderia, tudo! Great communication. Thank you for the perfect place Ana!

La verdad es que fue todo muy lindo!!! Ana Valeria tiene mucha buena onda, se preocupo porque siempre este todo bien, el departamento es muy amplio, cómodo, tiene todo lo que se precisa, muy limpio y ordenado, todo funciona a la perfección. La ubicación es espectacular, cerca de la playa y a minutos de Ipanema. Ana Valeria una genia, una persona muy cálida. Muy recomendable!!!!!

Muy bien ubicado, Valeria fue muy amable y atenta. 
Sin duda recomindo su departamento.
Excelente localização e a Valeria uma excelente anfitriã, super preocupada em nos deixar muito a vontade. O apartamento tem uma energia muito boa.
Ideal para um casal, com ótima localização próximo a supermercado, restaurantes e bancos. Valéria é super receptiva e nos recebeu muito bem. Ficaria hospedada aqui novamente. :)

La zona es la mejor, cerca de pla 2 mejores playas de Rio, el departamento es bastante comodo y es tal como lo muestran en fotos, Ana Valeria y su esposo son extremadamente amables y serviciales, nos ayudaron mucho. Un pequeño punto a mejorar son los canales de Tv que solo son unos 6 y  solo un par de entretenimiento.

Ana Valéria é muito prestativa e as fotos do apartamento refletem realmente como é. Localização excelente. 
Recomendo
Great location lot of amenities we're close and is easy to work with I would stay there again
Ótima localização, tudo a mão, excelente atendimento, preço justo, lugar amplo e aconchegante. Recomendo.
Nice location. Great host . I do recoment.

Nice place and location!
Thanks!

O apto é super bem localizado, funcional e limpo. O prédio é antigo (como todos no bairro de Copacabana) mas o apto em si é muito bom. Apesar de estar em avenida super movimentada, o barulho externo foi menor do que eu esperava. Dormi muito bem. Eu e minha familia gostamos muito da nossa estadia nele. Tem Mercado, bancos, padaria na mesma quadra e fica 1 quadra da praia de Copacabana.

Fue una estadía increíble! Ana Valeria fue muy atenta y el departamento impecable, súper bien equipado y excelente ubicación. Mejor que en las fotos!  Estábamos a pocos pasos de las playas de Copacabana e Ipanema. El entorno súper seguro, con perfecto acceso a compras y restorantes. Quedamos felices con nuestra visita a Río, totalmente recomendado

Hermoso departamento.. el aire acondicionado y ventiladores excelentes. Departamento muy limpio, contaba con todo lo necesario: juguera, tostadora, lavadora, zona para tender ropa, plancha... todo. El sector... el mejor.. a una cuadra de la playa, al lado un mercado para comprar frutas..  muy cerca del supermercado... farmacias, banco, la playa hermosa... muy tranquilo, no tuve ningún problema, muchos turistas.. todo muy iluminado. A dos cuadras está el hotel Atlantis... donde compré 3 tours a : Angra do Reis/Isla Grande, Búzios y uno a Cabo do Reis... todos excelentes 200 reales por persona. Recomiendo un restaurante a 2 cuadras del depto de Valeria se llama Eclipse... ricas pizas a 12,5 reales... hamburguesas con papa a 18 reales... carnes con agregados(picaña) a 33 reales... muy rico y buen precio. Valeria una excelente anfitriona, muy confiable. Uber funciona sin problema. Lo pasamos increíble.
El dpto es como en las fotos, Ana Valeria super amable, nos ayudo con sugerencias turisticas . Esta bien super bien ubicado, entre copacabana e ipanema.

L appartement est très bien situé, à 2 pas de la plage de Copacabana et tout près d Ipanema, dans un quartier sans problème 
Il y a juste en bas un petit supermarché très  bien approvisionné pour cuisiner
Nos hôtes nous ont très bien accueilli et ont été très disponibles pour communiquer pendant tout le séjour !

A Ana Valéria é com ctz uma superanfitriã, nos recebeu presencialmente antes do horário de checkin em virtude da acomodação das bagagens e o fez com muita simpatia e alegria. Foi solicita em tudo q foi perguntado, sempre de forma rápida e prática. Na hora do checkout tbm foi flexível em nos auxiliar para acomodação da bagagem à espera do horário do vôo. O ap é muito limpo e aconchegante, com vários utensílios domésticos q facilitam a vida do turista para q economize em sua estadia. A localização é privilegiada, a uma quadra da praia de Copacabana e a 5 min caminhando da praia do Arpoador, nossa preferida, que aliás, é bom ressaltar, estava muito bem policiada durante minha estadia de 7 dias no Rio. Superecomendo o ap de Ana Valéria e com ctz voltarei em breve.
Local super bem localizado, amplo, perto de todas as comodidades possíveis...praia fica bem próximo...

O apartamento é bem localizado,  limpo e a Ana Valéria é muito atenciosa. 
Voltaria com certeza.

Me hospedei com mais dois amigos no apto da Ana! Foi tudo perfeito! Ela nos ajudou com tudo que precisávamos!
O apto está em boas condições, tinha tudo que precisávamos, desde utensílios de cozinha até roupas de cama e banho.
A localização é ótima! Uma quadra do posto 6 em Copacabana e 10min de Ipanema! Possui supermercado, padaria e farmácias na porta do edifício! 
Tivemos uma ótima estada! Obrigado Ana!
Espaço muito bem localizado, região tranquila e (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei a me hospedar lá! Os proprietários são de fácil comunicação e são prestativos.

Nos encanto Río! 
AnaValeria súper amable y encantadora.
El departamento muy cómodo y muy lindo, tal cual las fotos.
Todo perfecto!
Esperamos volver!
Gracias!!!

Ana Valeria a été super réactive dès notre réservation. Elle était là pour nous accueillir et nous montrer l appartement. Celui-ci était bien équipé notamment la cuisine, top comme ça nous avons pu preparer les petits plats pour bébé. L emplacement est idéal pour qui souhaite profiter d Ipanema e Copacabana. Restaurant et bars à proximité. Nous avons passé 4 jours à Rio très sympa.

Excelente departamento y muy bien ubicado entre las playas de Copacabana (1 cuadra) e Ipanema (5 cuadras). Tiene todas las comodidades para tener una excelente estancia en una ciudad como Río de Janeiro! Hay un supermercado justo al lado del edificio, muy cómodo para abastecerse a toda hora, y bancos enfrente en la misma cuadra. Ya me he alojado 2 veces aquí y volvería a hacerlo! La hospitalidad de Valeria fue excelente ambas veces, tanto al ingresar como al salir del departamento.
m legal
Ana was a fantastic host. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. The location was perfect.  We had a great trip to Rio. I highly recommend.
Excelente alojamiento con ubicación ideal para conocer río, supermercado a 10 metros, equipado con todo lo necesario y muy buena atención de parte de Ana Valeria. Muy recomendable

Excelente apartamento super limpo, arejado e espaçoso. A anfitriã dispensa comentários, excelente pessoa, sempre disposta a ajudar, super prestativa e um amor de (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza iremos retornar é super recomendo

A minha estadia no apartamento da Ana Valéria foi incrível! O apartamento é exatamente como mostram as fotos, é muito confortável e acomoda tranquilamente até quatro pessoas! Tem tudo o que é preciso para uma boa estadia, como utensílios de cozinha e roupas de cama e banho! Os banheiros estavam extremamente limpos, a recepção e a comunicação foi ótima! Além disso, é preciso destacar a localização, bem próxima às praias de Copacabana e Ipanema, e de estar no mesmo quarteirão de lanchonete, padaria, restaurante, supermercado, farmácia e bancos! Super indico e com certeza voltaria a me hospedar lá.

Wir haben zu dritt 3 Nächte im Apartment von Ana Valeria verbracht. Die Kommunikation hat sehr gut funktioniert und wir konnten das Apartment rasch finden. Wir wurden sehr herzlich begrüsst! Der Standort ist perfekt, da der Strand von Copacabana (ca.3 Min.) so wie die Ipanema (ca.10Min) zu Fuss zu erreiche sind. Zudem ist ein Supermarkt direkt neben dem Eingang! Wir haben uns auch Nachts sicher gefühlt und würden die Unterkunft herzlichst weiter empfehlen.

Appartement propre , confortable et parfaitement situé. Valeria est très réactive, j’ai eu un soucis avec le pommeau de douche qui a cassé le soir et le lendemain matin c’était changé. Je recommande sans aucun doute.
Maravilhosa estadia! Ap muito aconchegante, bem localizado, perto da praia, comércios, restaurantes e metrô. Ana Valéria é um amor!
Regular...

O apartamento fica a menos de 2 quadras da praia e do Forte de Copacabana (que é um lugar que vale a pena visitar). Um pouquinho depois, caminhando, já se chega no Arpoador. Na mesma quadra do apto tem supermercado, padaria e outros comércios. Ana Valéria foi sempre simpática e nos entregou o apto limpo e com todos os itens que poderíamos precisar, inclusive duas cadeiras de praia. Excelente! Recomendamos!
Com certeza recomendo o local, excelente recepçao e disponibilidade. Valeria sempre foi atenciosa e preocupada c nosso bem estar. Espaço amplo e muito bem localizado. Espero voltar mais vezes.

This is the second time I’ve stayed with Ana Valeria. Both stays were about a month. Ana Valeria is a sweet and considerate host. 

I would not call the apartment luxurious, but it has everything you need and it’s clean. A small kitchen, and laundry is a must for me. If you’re like me, and you love Rio, and go to the beach everyday, there is no better location. I can hop on a skateboard and get to Leme or leblon, no prob. 

I won’t say more, so when I want to book again it will be available!!

Thank you Ana Valeria. Beijão, amiga.

Incrível hospitalidade, fizemos o check-in antes do horário combinado! O apartamento é super legal, extremamente bem localizado. Panificadoras, mercados, restaurantes, bancos, metro, praias e diversas coisas ao alcance. Ar condicionado antigo mas funciona bem e é limpo.
Tudo conforme anunciado. Recomendo e voltaria.

O apartamento da Ana Valéria é ótimo em todas as questões... a localização é fantástica. A Ana Valéria é uma excelente anfitriã, nos recebeu muito bem com alguns mimos extras. Adorei meus dias no apartamento dela!
Tudo perfeito! O apto é muito bem localizado e atendeu perfeitamente minha família. Anfitriã prestativa e atenciosa.

name: Charming Flat in Downtown Moda
summary: Fully furnished 3+1 flat decorated with vintage style.  Located at the heart of Moda/Kadıköy, close to seaside and also to the public transportation (tram, metro, ferry, bus stations) 10 minutes walk.
space: The apartment is composed of 1 big bedroom with double sized bed, a guest room with double sofa bed , a living room with 2 double sofa bed. It's suitable for max 6  people. Every bedroom has balcony overlooking the calm streets of Moda, where you will find relax and intimacy , even if at one step from the most vivid Moda's living streets. There's also private parking area with remote controller. The apartment is away from the traffic and the most crowded places, good for the ensuring quiet and a peaceful rest. The apartment is fully available to guests and is equipped with heating in all bedrooms. In the living room there is a HD TV and Apple TV. In the kitchen, there are dishwasher, oven and washing machine, with the respective detergents. You will find fresh water in the fridge and on the kitchen there are a toaster, kettle, coffee maker. neighborhood_overview: With its diversity Moda- Kadikoy is one of the most colorfull neighbourhood of Istanbul. The place is  surrounded by lots of cafe's, pubs, concert halls, restaurants and art studios. Being local is wonderful if you're staying here.
house_rules: Be and feel like your own home, with total respect and love..this would be wonderful!

reviews.comments:
Zeynep was a most welcoming and generous host, with a gorgeous, comfortable flat - as advertised! The flat is light and spacious, kitchen well-equipped, bed comfortable (both beds actually), and bathroom clean, with great shower pressure. Zeynep prepared a note with key information about the flat, which was great to have for reference. I especially appreciated the ground coffee and coffee maker. The fact that there was a desk in the house made my stay all the more comfortable - I had a proper place to sit down at my computer.

It's clear that Zeynep has put a lot of care into making her flat a home - it's an awesome flat! 

Zeynep lives a five min walk to the sea, with a great park along the water front. There are plenty of hip cafes and coffee shops in the neighborhood (Moda), all a short walk from the flat. And it's only a 15 mins walk to the Kadikoy ferry, which offers easy access to the rest of Istanbul.

name: Catete's Colonial Big Hause Room B
summary: Old floor, intirely reformed, destined to receive people in a very harmonious and welcoming place. Located at Catete's neighborhood, with a very easy access to the metro station, a lot of bus lines, next to a excellent trade and things to do around.
space: Este quarto está preparado para acomodar confortavelmente quatro pessoas, podendo ainda ser acrescentado um sofá-cama para receber mais um hóspede.
description: Old floor, intirely reformed, destined to receive people in a very harmonious and welcoming place. Located at Catete's neighborhood, with a very easy access to the metro station, a lot of bus lines, next to a excellent trade and things to do around.
neighborhood_overview: A Grande Morada situa-se no Bairro do Catete, histórico bairro ladeado pelo morro de Santa Tereza, pelo bairro da Lapa, pelo Parque do Flamengo e pelo Largo do Machado. Esta localização privilegiada oferece, em seu entorno, além das belas paisagens, acesso à Estação de Metro, a várias linhas de ônibus e a excelente e diversificado comércio, lazer e diversão. É um bairro pequeno e seguro, esteticamente bonito, habitado por pessoas cordiais que se conhecem e convivem cotidianamente, o que pode ser atestado por nós, que aqui moramos há mais de trinta anos.
notes: A casa possui um potencial incrível para receber grupos. Os quartos são amplos e comunicáveis.
transit: Perto do metrô e várias linhas de ônibus. Acesso a pé para o centro da cidade e para o bairro da Lapa e Santa Tereza.
access: O hóspedes poderão acessar espaços compartilhados como sala de TV e estar, terraço, área para refeições.
interaction: Sou geógrafa, gosto de arte e cultura. Moro neste endereço (porém em outro espaço, que não o casarão) com meu companheiro Carlos Henrique, que é músico, farmacêutico e acupunturista, meus filhos Pedro, estudante do ensino médio e Estevão estudante de antropologia . Somos todos os três responsáveis pelas hospedagens e manutenção do Casarão. Sejam bem vindos! Estaremos com total disponibilidade para ajudá-los.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
A Beatriz foi bastante atenciosa e respondia as minhas dúvidas muito rapidamente antes da viagem. O bairro do Catete tem uma localização boa, conseguimos ir para a Lapa à pé e também para outros lugares como o aterro e a praia do Flamengo durante o carnaval. A estação de metrô também é perto e tem várias opções de alimentação muito próximas à casa. O layout da casa assemelha-se à um hostel, o quarto que eu fiquei tem tamanho excelente para 4 pessoas e tem ar condicionado, o que faz muita diferença com o calor que está no Rio de Janeiro. Existem 4 banheiros, que são suficientes para o número de pessoas que cabem na casa, entretanto durante todos os dias que passei lá, o banheiro não foi limpo nenhuma vez, por sorte os hóspedes estavam mantendo-o em condições de uso, mas seria importante limpar o banheiro de vez em quando. 
Outro ponto importante é que os quartos são ligados por uma porta que não tem fechadura e é bem fina, ou seja, a privacidade não é garantida e o barulho de um quarto pode ser ouvido perfeitamente no outro.
O preço é justo pelo que é oferecido, seria importante apenas melhorar a limpeza e verificar se é possível fechar a comunicação dos quartos.
